command.name: Bildirimdeki Gecikme
command.cmd: select /* + parallel(x,8) */ notification_date, triggering_event_date, event_type, notification_type, status from arc_abone_bildirim x where notification_date like '#yesterday%'

command.name: CDR İşleme Gecikme
command.cmd: select /* + parallel(x,16) */ arama_zamani, process_date from arc_in_rated_cdr x where process_date like '#yesterday%' and donem=#prevDonem
